name: Planetesimal (jacekku)
description:
Planetesimal Goal:

Build buildings to gather metal and energy

Build Houses to create more creatures

Build Turrets and Shields to protect against asteroids

Create Ship yard to create space ships

Colonize all planets

There's no end screen

Instructions:

Left mouse button to select buildings and ships

Right mouse button to open context menu for creatures and buildings

Middle mouse button to move around the planetary system

Z to select multiple space ships

Q and E to rotate around planet

Building:

1. Select building from menu

2. If it is green then left click to build 

3. Move creatures into the building to assign them as builders

If the building is yellow then you don't have enough resources

If it is red then something else is blocking construction

Note:

If this project gains some popularity I will develop it more after october 2022
